text: 24:47 Aisaia 49:6; 49:22; Jeremaia 31:34; Maika 4:2; Malakai 1:11; Matyu 28:19; 1 Timoti 3:16Eghtɨ nan ziamɨn, ia nan akam inigh mangam. Ia Jerusalem ikegh nan akam inigh nguazimɨn mɨkebaba bar dar mangɨ. Ia ikɨziba bar dar gumazamizibav kɨmtɨ, me navibagh iraghtɨ kɨ men arazir kuraba gɨn amangam.
